entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow in the morning and ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
